titleInfo.title: Eddy Arnold Interview - Jack Taylor - 1963-09-04 - WGN

mods.abstract: Recording of an interview with Eddy Arnold (songwriter/performer), conducted by Jack Taylor (host) on September 4, 1963 with radio station WGN (Chicago, Ill.)

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
